President, St. John’s University
Collegeville, Minnesota
Dear Father Barry:
Thank you for your letter of March 8th, express¬
ing your interest in proposed legislation to be known as
the Public Television Act of 1967, and your particular
interest in the inclusion of radio broadcasting under the
proposed program.
Your well-stated concerns will surely be kept
in mind during further discussions and deliberations on
this subject. I am pleased that you have conveyed these
expressions to me.
With kindest personal regards,
OLrcj
